item.title: [English] Common E-mail Errors
item.description: 台灣人常出現的Email issue X : We need to cost down on this project. (“cost down” is not a word) X : Please feel free to contact with me. (“with” is unnecessary) X : If you have any question, please let me know. (“questions”) – Subject Lines: Subject Lines aren’t sentences, so don’t use period(.) Greeting: X: Dear Miss Lu, (Ms. is correct, because we don’t know she is married or not)
